titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Fort Greene historic interiors photographs V1988.033
titlestmt.author: Weatherly Stephan
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-25 13:41:17 +0000.

did.abstract: Three items, dated 1988, showing interiors of historic houses in the Fort Greene neighborhood of Brooklyn. Images in the collection include a mid-century kitchen and a colonial dining room and parlor. Photographs in the collection were taken by Phoebe Ferguson during a tour of landmarked homes given by the Fort Greene Landmarks Preservation Committee. A press release for the tour is available in the accession folder.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Three items, dated 1988, showing interiors of historic houses in the Fort Greene neighborhood of Brooklyn. Images in the collection include a mid-century kitchen and a colonial dining room and parlor. Photographs in the collection were taken by Phoebe Ferguson during a tour of landmarked homes given by the Fort Greene Landmarks Preservation Committee. A press release for the tour is available in the accession folder.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Item-level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Based on the date range of this collection, all items will enter the public domain by 2108. For information on securing rights to publish or reproduce, please see the Brooklyn Historical Society Reproduction Rights Policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Fort Greene historic interiors photographs, V1988.033, Box number, Object ID number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
